article_title: Somalis turning to politics to get 'seat at the table'

article_metadata.description: Second of two articlesSomalis in the Twin Cities say that they are moving into politics to “have a seat at the table.”For years, they’ve been on the receiving end of what the public has given them, whether it’s been financial aid, housing, schooling or medical care. Now they would like a say in what they get, if anything, and how it is given.

og.description: For years, they’ve been on the receiving end of what the public has given them. Now they would like a say in what they get, if anything, and how it is given.
og.title: Somalis turning to politics to get 'seat at the table'
